jobDescription: Job DescriptionWhen you join us at Thermo Fisher Scientific, youll be part of a smart, driven team that shares your passion for exploration and discovery. With revenues of $20 billion and the largest investment in R&D; in the industry, we give our people the resources and opportunities to make significant contributions to the world.  Do you want be a part of the journey of building smart connected lab solutions for Thermo Fisher Scientific products? Do you have a unique combination of deep technical knowledge, business acumen and strong interpersonal skills? Thermo Fisher Scientific is looking for an IoT Data Scientist accountable for the IoT Data Science platform. IoT connectivity service across multiple business verticals within Thermo Fisher Scientific.  At Thermo Fisher Scientific we want to make science easier with connected ecosystems & digital science innovations. The candidate will be spear heading the data science of the connected solution that can make the vision possible.
